com.pcloud.networking.client

Interface EndpointProvider


  • public interface EndpointProvider
    A contract for a provider object able to provide an Endpoint
    See Also:
    Endpoint

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static EndpointProvider DEFAULT
      Provides a default Endpoint

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Endpoint endpoint()
      Provides a custom Endpoint
      void endpointConnectionError(Endpoint endpoint, java.io.IOException error)
      Called when an exception is thrown on the current Endpoint

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT

        static final EndpointProvider DEFAULT
        Provides a default Endpoint
        See Also:
        Endpoint.DEFAULT

    • Method Detail

      • endpoint

        Endpoint endpoint()
        Provides a custom Endpoint
        Returns:
        The Endpoint you'd like this provider to provide

      • endpointConnectionError

        void endpointConnectionError(Endpoint endpoint,
                             java.io.IOException error)
        Called when an exception is thrown on the current Endpoint

        You should switch to the DEFAULT here

        Parameters:
        endpoint - The Endpoint that has an exception
        error - The exception that was thrown on the Endpoint
